Package io.mpos.provider

Interface Summary
Provider The payment provider is the main instance responsible for handling, creating, and managing transactions and the connection to external accessories.
ProviderOptions Options for instantiating a provider
ProviderOptionsFactory The provider options factory is used to create provider options for instantiating a new payment provider.
ProviderWithServerSubsystem Provider additions, exposing some functions that should normally be handled by a server.
 

Enum Summary
ProviderMode The mode the provider should operate in.
